1. Should You Cancel Xbox Game Pass? Everything to Know on the Price Hikes and New Features  WIRED
  2. Microsoft Confirms It Scrapped the Xbox Game Pass Discount on All Games and DLC Purchases, Gives Subscribers More Rewards Points Instead  IGN
  3. What the Xbox Game Pass price hike says about the rising cost of playing games  The Guardian
  4. PC Game Pass just got better: - Why pay $30 a month when $30 gets you three?  Windows Central
  5. Microsoft delays Xbox Game Pass Ultimate price hikes for some subscribers  The Verge
